DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether three airway clearance technique ( Bouncing , Assisted Autogenic Drainage ( AAD ) bounce AAD ) provoke aggravate gastro-esophageal reflux infant age 1 year .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Airway Clearance Techniques Infants .
DOC.criteria: infant < 1 year acid reflux monitor gestational age < 24 w antireflux medication Nissen fundoplication parental consent
